name: Hacker Maze
description:
Game concept:

Hacker maze is a 3d puzzle game prototype

The player is a hacker signal who needs to use the limited decoder to change the environment of the maze and therefore reach the destination.  Meanwhile, the player needs to avoid the laser defense program in the digital maze

Control guide:

  • WASD to move
  • Use the mouse right-click to use the decoder
  • Use the mouse left-click to take the decoder back
  • Scroll the middle mouse button to change the decoder's instruction
